mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer, parent_rno) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{parentRno})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc

SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate, parent_rno as parentRno FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} START WITH parent_rno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR rno = parent_rno ORDER SIBLINGS BY rno ASC
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
